text: DXKV (91.1 FM) Voice Radio is a radio station owned and operated by Kaissar Broadcasting Network. The station's studio is located along Rizal Ave., Brgy. Balangasan, Pagadian. DXKV is the 1st station opened by KBNI.Radio commentator charged with rapeMahigit anim na libong puno ng bakawan, itinanim sa KBP OPLAN BROADCASTREEING 2017 sa Zamboanga del SurMonth-long peace festival set in Iligan, LanaoCriminal Case No. SB-13-CRM-0707 ==References== Category:Radio stations in Zamboanga del Sur Category:Radio stations established in 1995 Category:1995 establishments in the Philippines
title: DXKV
